alert.note: Alert for Gallatin; Wayne; White (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 08 at 10:24AM CDT until August 14 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois... Little Wabash River at Carmi affecting White, Wayne and Gallatin Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Wabash River at Carmi. * WHEN...Until early Sunday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM CDT Monday the stage was 29.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:30 AM CDT Monday was 29.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 30.2 feet Wednesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
